questions.question: How would you describe me?
questions.description: Ask everyone to tell you 3 words they immediately think about when they think about you and why

questions.question: Ask a player something you're always curious about
What is the most important lesson you learned about life
questions.description: Some things we learn stay with us forever

questions.question: Closer your eyes, how would you introduce each player to someone who is to join the game but has never met them before?
questions.description: No second thoughts, say things that come to your mind first

questions.question: Tell us about something you're most proud of this year
questions.description: How did you change? What is something significant that happened?

questions.question: What are three qualities that are special about you
questions.description: What is something that comes naturally to you but not for other people you know

questions.question: Tell us about an event that shaped who you are
questions.description: What is something that completely changed how you view the world?

questions.question: Tell us about your first love
questions.description: How did you meet? How has it shaped your view about relationships

questions.question: What are some qualities you look for in a partner
questions.description: What do you value the most in love relationships?

questions.question: Pretend you are another player
questions.description: Act as if you are another player until other people correctly guess it right

questions.question: Describe everyone as an animal
questions.description: What would each player be and why

questions.question: What are 5 things you can't stand other people do
Describe your ideal type
questions.description: What are they like? Why is that your ideal?

questions.question: If you have to give a tattoo to every where are what are you going to put
What is your biggest insecurities
questions.description: About yourself, about how others perceive you...

questions.question: What is a fictional/controversial character you have had a crush on?
questions.description: Patrick Star, Maximus (the horse from Rapunzel), Lord Voldemort, etc.
